docs.title: Quick Start
docs.text:
# Install lib
pip3 install douban-crack
# Download

import requests
from douban_crack import crack_html
r = requests.get("https://search.douban.com/book/subject_search?search_text=黑天鹅&cat=1001")
assert r.status_code == 200
print(crack_html(r.text))

docs.title: Lint
docs.text:
hatch + ruff + mypy + black

hatch run lint:all
hatch run lint:fmt

docs.title: Build and Publish
docs.text:
hatch build
tar -tvf dist/douban_crack-*.tar.gz

# to testpypi
twine upload --repository testpypi dist/*
# to pypi
twine upload dist/*
